name: Writer's Hub : 25+ Writing Resources
description: Struggling to find the perfect resources to kickstart your Content Writing Biz? Look no further. Grab your FREE Notion Content Writing Resource Template and dominate the Writing game by leaving behind 99% of your Competition. features: Writing Resources- Blogs, YouTube, Courses & Newsletter; Daily Writing Habit Tracker- To become a Writing Machine; Goal Tracker- To set Daily,  Monthly and Yearly Writing Goals; For Beginner Writers who want to learn Content Writing from scratch; For Full-Time Writers to elevate their Content Writing skills; For Freelance Writers who want to Make Money Online Writing; Daily Writing Habit Tracker- To surpass 99% of your Competition by creating content daily and putting it out in Public.; Goal Tracker- Set Daily, Monthly and Yearly Writing goals to hit your desired Income milestones.
